sentence: The group previously filed similar actions against Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.) and Rep. Paul Gosar (R-Ariz.) on the same grounds, citing the 14th Amendment’s disqualification clause.
author: Adam Klasfeld
title: Federal Judge Refuses to Block Effort to Disqualify Marjorie Taylor Greene from Office Under 14th Amendment ‘Insurrection’ Prohibition

sentence: Only the People have the right to choose who they send to Congress.” Similar challenges have been brought up against other Republican members of Congress, including Reps. Paul Gosar and Andy Biggs of Arizona as well as North Carolina Rep. Madison Cawthorn.
author: Callie Patteson
title: Marjorie Taylor Greene first congressperson to testify about Jan. 6

sentence: That’s why they’re coming after me, and they’re coming after Andy Biggs, Paul Gosar, they went after Madison [Cawthorn].” And who does Greene believe is behind it?
author: Kristen Doerer
title: Marjorie Taylor Greene Says Legal Challenge to Take Her Off the Ballot Is a ‘Globalist’ Ploy for a ‘One World Government’
